ryhHD8hvd.description: Sets PWM duty cycle for the load in the range [0; 1] where 0.0 is full off and 1.0 is full on.
ryhHD8hvd.label: VAL

Bkx2BwInD_.description: Active. When false, the node does not follow changes of VAL
Bkx2BwInD_.label: ACT

r1EvDI2vd.description: Acknowledge. Pulses when a change on VAL is reflected to the hardware
r1EvDI2vd.label: ACK

@/buzzer-pwm-load.description: Sends analog signal (VAL) to buzzer when ACT is True.

r1lQ8x8hDu.description: Duty cycle value in range 0.0 â€¦ 1.0
r1lQ8x8hDu.label: DUTY

@/example-buzzer-pwm-load.description: Simple buzzer. Produces sound when button A is pressed. Stops buzzing when button A is released.

BJI7aY7U6wO.content:
Tone
====
Tone (time high) is calculated using the following formula:

*timeHigh* = *period* / 2 = 1 / (2 * *toneFrequency*)

Source: https://www.arduino.cc/en/tutorial/melody

description: Nodes for the Wio Terminal's built-in buzzer. Wio Terminal is an ATSAMD51-based microcontroller with wireless connectivity powered by Realtek RTL8720DN (https://www.seeedstudio.com/Wio-Terminal-p-4509.html).
name: wio-terminal-buzzer
